channel.title: LeftLion Radio - Nottingham Culture
channel.itunes:subtitle: Nottingham chat music and japes
channel.itunes:author: LeftLion
channel.itunes:summary: LeftLion Radio is the only Podcast straight outta Nottingham, England (or at least it was when we last checked on iTunes) brought to you by Nish and The K, two gobby masterdons who attend themselves to the issues of the day in Hoodtown, play 100percent Nottingham tunes old and new, and generally BRING THE CHELP. Warning; the language is of the sort that your Nana wouldnt approve of, so turn them speakers down if you are at work, or your Mams doing the hoovering outside your bedroom...
channel.description: LeftLion Radio is the only Podcast straight outta Nottingham, England (or at least it was when we last checked on iTunes) brought to you by Nish and The K, two gobby masterdons who attend themselves to the issues of the day in Hoodtown, play 100percent Nottingham tunes old and new, and generally BRING THE CHELP. Warning; the language is of the sort that your Nana wouldnt approve of, so turn them speakers down if you are at work, or your Mams doing the hoovering outside your bedroom...

item.title: LeftLion Radio No 1
item.itunes:author: Nish and K
item.itunes:subtitle: Nottingham chat music and japes
item.itunes:summary: Students with bad haircuts...Nottinghams first-ever lapdancing club...the Danielle Beccan trial...How pathetically excited you get when you see a bus you know on Central News...Dale Wintons death-curse on youts in Hyson Green...the worlds longest jingle...the rubbishness of Goose Fair...the porn cinema that used to be near Selectadisc...a blatant plug for the tater shop next to the Social...and a new French restaurant called Fanne...
item.itunes:keywords: Nottingham, Music, Talk, Comedy, News, LeftLion

item.title: LeftLion Radio No 2
item.itunes:author: Nish and K
item.itunes:subtitle: Nottingham chat music and japes
item.itunes:summary: The 600 shops who want to come to Nottingham... Lottery Millionaires in Sneinton... 24-hour drinking...twatty Mods marching from Viccy Centre to Broado...flagrant vandalism in the Co-Op...Dungeons and Dragons-dissing...asking monkeys if you can crash round their yard...Nish brags about having been round Chicos house...an absolutely MENTAL Radio Nottingham jingle from the 70s...German Ragga...and absolutely no mention of bastard Christmas...
item.itunes:keywords: Nottingham, Music, Talk, Comedy, News, LeftLion

item.title: LeftLion Radio No 3
item.itunes:author: Nish and K
item.itunes:subtitle: Nottingham chat music and japes
item.itunes:summary: Erm, well. K did his voice in at the Oasis gig, and Nish forgot to bring the setlist along, so this week's edition is rough as you like. But it's not like you've had to pay for tit, is it? In any case, they style it with their usual indomitable finesse, covering such important topics as the woeful state of Forest, the LeftLion quiz, whether all white people look like Cliff Richard or not, and, er, random mithering about Nottingham. oh yeah and the following music: Am I Blue - First Blood, Out Of My Mind - The Silver Tongues, Spies On You - Computerman, No Strings - Lee Ramsay, My Jealous Mind - Alvin Stardust, V2 - The Henry Road, It's A New Dawn - Sophie Johnson-Hill and All I Really Want From You Is Love - Six By Seven.
item.itunes:keywords: Nottingham, Music, Talk, Comedy, News, LeftLion

item.title: LeftLion Radio No 4
item.itunes:author: Nish and K
item.itunes:subtitle: Nottingham chat music and japes
item.itunes:summary: It's world cup time, Drop in The Ocean time and Al and K are back with avengance. Check out their new show.
item.itunes:keywords: Nottingham, Music, Talk, Comedy, News, LeftLion

item.itunes:summary: LeftLion.co.uk is three years old, LeftLion magazine is two years old, and LeftLion Radio is one year old! Woohoo!
